remarks: Degree of a nonzero univariate polynomial.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 23-Mar-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 7-Oct-2015.)
statement:
deg1z.d $e |- D = ( deg1 ` R ) $.
deg1z.p $e |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) $.
deg1z.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` P ) $.
deg1nn0cl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` P ) $.
deg1nn0cl $p |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ F e. B /\ F =/= .0. ) -> ( D ` F ) e. NN0 ) $.
